sentences.sContent: In that region, Chile went from ninth to first, overall, as Chilean mobile web use increased by 3200% over the past year.
sentences.sContent_eng: In that region, Chile went from ninth to first, overall, as Chilean mobile web use increased by 3200% over the past year.
sentences.sCn: 智利从这一地区的第九跃升到第一位，因为智利的移动网络用户在过去一年增长了 3200% 。

sentences.sContent: Then, in eighth or ninth grade, I studied astronomy, cosmology, and the origins of the universe.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then, in eighth or ninth grade, I studied astronomy, cosmology, and the origins of the universe.
sentences.sCn: 后来，在八、九年级的时候，我在学习天文学，宇宙学和宇宙的起源。

words.tran: 第九十的；九十分之一的

trans.tranOther: one of nine equal parts of something
coming after eight other things in a series
one of nine equal parts of something
